meanings.sent1: The two friends were intercommunicating their thoughts and feelings.
meanings.sent2: The team members were intercommunicating their ideas to come up with a solution.
meanings.sent3: The cats were intercommunicating with each other through meows and purrs.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the tree were intercommunicating with each other, sharing nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The students were intercommunicating eagerly during the group project.

meanings.sent1: The neighbors were intercommunicating about the upcoming block party.

meanings.sent3: The birds were intercommunicating their migration plans to each other.
meanings.sent4: The computers were intercommunicating data at lightning speed.
